name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
One of the most beautiful UNESCO World Heritage sites and one of the must sees in Finland. From the layers of history, to the nature, the calm sea views, the hike, the cafes and restaurants, it simply has it all and it's just an incredible place to spend a weekend with friends and family.

I highly recommend the visit!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
A great place to visit as a day trip in Helsinki. This is a UNESCO world heritage site and indeed it is a combination of historical, cultural and natural entities. So a person can experience all of these aspects in a single visit. This site has its unique military architecture. The old fortress, tunnels, ship yards are well preserved to witness its unique history.
Since this is a combination of four main islands, the natural beauty of the sea is absolutely stunning. There are plenty of places to rest near the beach and safe places to have a bath as well.
There are several museums, many restaurants, bars, parks, shopping areas, open air theatres and churches here in this area which feels like a mini town. So it is a full package of experiences which can be enjoyed as a full day trip. Also there are accommodations inside the island if you need to stay overnight.
To visit this island, ferry services are operated regularly from the market square and the HSL tickets are valid in these ferries. So there is no other costs for the ride.

Thank you for your review!

Happy to hear you enjoyed visiting Suomenlinna. Suomenlinna Sea Fortress consists of eight different islands and five of them are connected with bridges. There is one beach for swimming, and it's located in the last island called Kustaanmiekka. 

Suomenlinna fortress is also a vibrant neighbourhood of Helsinki. For its 800 residents there are services such as a library, grocery store, school and church.

Thank you for giving us a review! Suomenlinna is indeed a gorgeous place for a walk in a historical environment. The best way to explore the main sights of the UNESCO World Heritage Site is to follow the Blue Route. Like you mentioned, Suomenlinna is easy to reach. The HSL ferry runs all year round, and during the summer season, you can also arrive by private company waterbus. 

Hope to see you again soon in Suomenlinna!
We are happy to hear that you had a great visit to Suomenlinna

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Sehr schönes Ausflugsziel. Viele sehenswerte Orte in der schönen Natur. Die Insel ist vom Marktplatz im Hafen aus bequem mit den regelmäßig verkehrenden Fähren zu erreichen.
owner_answer:
Thank you for giving us a review and for recommending us.

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Sisli gittik şen döndük 😁 yaklaşık 20dk sürüyor yolculuk, ağustosta çiçekler deniz doğa harikaydı, kışın da güzel olur mu bilemem. AB zone bileti ile gidebilirsiniz. Müzenin kafesiden kart postal ve pul alıp görevliye teslim ediyorsunuz onlar postalıyorlar, sevdiklerinize kart  göndermek güzel nostaljik bir hediye olabilir
owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your experience! We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit to Suomenlinna and appreciated the island’s natural beauty. Each season offers a unique atmosphere and changing views, making every visit special. We look forward to welcoming you back to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
非常漂亮悠閒的小島～
可以直接搭乘HSL的公共渡輪前往，每20分鐘就有一班船，大約15分鐘抵達。

島上很適合散步、曬太陽，也有一個小海灘可以游泳（包含更衣、沖水的空間）

🍎 碼頭旁就有一間超市，可以購買點心在島上野餐。

🚾 所有的廁所都可以免費使用

💬 10:00、14:00 有英文的解說
owner_answer: Thank you for the review and for the pictures! Warmly welcome back to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Mooi fort. Er is op het eiland informatie beschikbaar (Fins, Zweeds en Engels) over het fort, de bouw en de geschiedenis.
Toegang tot het fort is gratis. Er zijn 5 musea die je kan bezoeken (per musea kun je een kaartje kopen).
De eilanden zijn netjes en schoon. Naast het fort kun jw genieten van de prachtige natuur!
In de ochtend was het rustig. Na 14 uur was het zeer druk (zomervakantie).
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and for sharing some nice photos.

In addition to the 5 museums, in summer there is also the Customs Museum which is free of charge.

Hope to see you again in Suomenlinna! At Suomenlinna Visitor Centre next to the main ferry pier you can get the best tips of the day. The Visitor Centre is open almost every day of the year.

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Molto bella l'intera isola, quando sono andata c'era molto vento, quindi consiglio qualcosa per coprirsi adeguatamente. È molto bella da girare e fermarsi a godere del sole su qualche panchina.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review!

Happy to hear you have enjoyed Suomenlinna. We also recommend to wear warm clothes in Suomenlinna as it's often windy in the island. However, if you feel cold during your visit, you find interesting museums and wonderful cafes and restaurants which are great places to have a break indoors. 

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Suosikkipaikkojani Helsingissä. Kun saavut lauttarantaan, älä lähde muiden perään vaan käänny ensin oikealle ja tutustu sillan takana oleviin Pikku- ja Länsi-Musta -saariin. Paremmat maisemat ja vähemmän väkeä. Sieltä sitten paluumatkalla muut saaret, jos jalat riittävät.
owner_answer:
Kiitos arvostelusta!

Ensimmäistä kertaa Suomenlinnassa vieraileville suosittelemme sinistä reittiä, joka kulkee kolmen pääsaaren sekä päänähtävyyksien kautta. On myös tärkeää huomioida, että Pikku Mustasaari on puolustusvoimien aluetta ja tämän vuoksi suurin osa saaresta on suljettu. Länsi-Mustasaaressa on puolestaan vain asuntoja, joten sieltä ei löydy palveluita tai linnoituksen päänähtävyyksiä. 

Tervetuloa uudelleen Suomenlinnaan!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Una buena manera de pasar la mañana, un paseo en ferry y unas horas andando rodeando la isla. No hay cosas interesantes individuales que ver, pero el conjunto teniendo en cuenta las pocas cosas que ver en Helsinki es interesante. El ferry tiene una frecuencia de 1 hora o 40 minutos. Cuesta 2.95 euros y te ahorras el billete de vuelta si haces el recorrido de la isla en una hora. No compres el billete de vuelta junto al de ida porque es un billete de una hora y media pero desde que lo compras, no desde que lo válidas.
owner_answer:
Muchas gracias por tu reseña!

Es verdad que en otoño el ferry tiene una frecuencia de 1 hora o 40 minutos mientras que en verano el ferry sale cada 15-20 minutos. El ferry forma parte del transporte público de Helsinki y por eso el billete es válido también en tranvías, autobuses, trenes de cercanías y metro en las zonas A y B.

Bienvenido de nuevo a Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Uno dei posti più belli di Helsinki, ci si arriva con una breve traversata con il traghetto (biglietto urbano dei trasporti) per scoprire un'isola pittoresca e suggestiva, che si visita in un paio di ore. Sono presenti un punto di ristoro e un bookshop d museo militare dell'isola. Nel prezzo del biglietto è compresa la visita a un sottomarino militare.
owner_answer: Thank you for your review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your visit to Suomenlinna and appreciated the services available at the fortress. For more information on cafés, restaurants, galleries, and museums, feel free to visit our website at suomenlinna.fi. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Bellissima esperienza!! per il traghetto scegliete i biglietti A+B, senza sono 100€ di multa. L’isola è da visitare tutta , vecchia fortezza , che ora ospita diverse caserme , gode di posti davvero suggestivi e panoramici … in base ai giorni , nel tardo pomeriggio chiude tutto… organizzatevi con bici e acqua!!
owner_answer: Thank you for the review and for the amazing pictures! We look forward on welcoming you back to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Bellissimo parco/museo facilmente raggiungibile dal porto di Helsinki con il traghetto. Al suo interno sono presenti musei e locali dove mangiare/bere per passare una giornata all'aria aperta.
owner_answer: Thank you for the review and for the beautiful pictures! Warmly welcome back to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Поистине красивый и наполненный историей остов. Рекомендую с раннего утра приехать, пока мало народу
Сам вход бесплатный,но за паром надо заплатить + есть много музеев платных
owner_answer: Thank you for giving us a review! It is great to hear your visit to Suomenlinna was pleasant. To explore the fortress we recommend following the blue route since it takes you to all the main attractions on the island and is the most sustainable way to get around. When you choose your route responsibly, you help protect the delicate environment, respect the residents' peace, and also take care of your own safety. Welcome back to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Bel luogo da visitare anche se la fortezza era chiusa. Abbiamo visitato il parco e la chiesa. Suggerisco battello pubblico che è compreso nell' abbonamento bus e metro
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and nice photos from the fortress and of our recommended way to explore the fortress, the Blue route.

Suomenlinna fortress is always open as it is also a neighbourhood of Helsinki with about 800 residents. Main historical sights can be discovered outdoors and mostly along the Blue route. You can check opening hours for services (museums, cafés, restaurants, shops and so on) on our website or by stopping by Suomenlinna Visitor Centre next to the main ferry pier. At the Visitor Centre we are open daily and happy to give you the best tips of the day.

It is easy to visit Suomenlinna in any season as the Suomenlinna ferry operates all year round. In summer season (May-September) you can also catch a waterbus to get to the fortress. Please note that the waterbus service is operated by a private company. Tickets to the waterbus can be bought on line or on board.

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Soovitan kindlasti käia. Sadamast läheb saarele keskmiselt iga 20 minuti pärast praam. Praam oli kahekordne, kus all korrusel oli kinnine ruum ja üleval lahtine. Praamisõit kestis umbes 15 minutit. Kohale jõudes soovitan käia läbi kohe turismi punktist, kust saab saarte kaardi. Ala on väga suur ja meie lõpuni ei jalutanudki. Saarel on erinevad lahedad muuseumid, meie käisime sõjamuuseumis ja vanas allveelaevas.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review!

Happy to hear you have enjoyed Suomenlinna. It's true that there is a lot to explore in Suomenlinna. Besides the interesting museums, you can find amazing historical sights and beautiful nature. We also recommend to explore the wonderful cafes and restaurants in Suomenlinna. 

Welcome again!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
看多了城市景觀，可以抽一天空來趟芬蘭堡進行戶外之旅，這裡原本是軍事要塞，現為世界文化遺產，有許多景點可以參觀。
美中不足的是回程船票販售機竟然都故障沒地方購票，詢問後只能下載APP購買船票，又不能一次購足，只能一張張購買，非常不便。
owner_answer: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review! It is great to hear you enjoyed Suomenlinna sea fortress! We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the malfunctioning ticket machines for the HSL ferry. We reported the issue to HSL, and the problem was addressed. We hope to welcome you back to Suomenlinna soon!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Buen lugar para dar un paseo de un par de horas. Hay ferries de transporte público que salen cada pocos minutos del puerto. Frecuencia alta y durante muchas horas al día, puesto que en la isla vive gente.
owner_answer:
Muchas gracias por tu reseña!

Es verdad que Suomenlinna es un hogar para 800 residentes y por eso el ferry va a Suomenlinna regularmente durante todo el año. Por ejemplo en verano los ferries salen cada 15-20 minutos. Por lo tanto, es muy fácil llegar a Suomenlinna para visitarlo.

Bienvenido de nuevo!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Suomenlinna è Sito UNESCO ed é conosciuta come fortezza navale, per i suoi musei, il sommergibile, i cannoni ed i bunker. Ci si arriva solo in traghetto, ed é apprezzata da turisti e residenti anche come area dove andare a passeggiare e rilassarsi allo splendido sole, che ad agosto si faceva assolutamente sentire. É un luogo pittoresco, adatto anche per picnic e per prendere il sole (viste bellissime calette). Le isole di fronte ad Helsinki meritano tutte una visita o un giro in barca. Ma Suonenlinna, con le sue case di legno, ti ruba il ❤️
owner_answer:
Thank you for giving us a review and for sharing some lovely photos from the fortress in summer.

Warmly welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: 헬싱키 부두에서 배로 15분 정도의 거리에 있는 역사가 숨어있는 장소 입니다. 여러개의 섬이 연결되어 역사유물을 보며 가벼운 산책로로 좋습니다. 주말에는 사람이 좀 많으니 평일을 추천 합니다.

Thank you for your review!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
要塞の島は自然に溢れ、鳥と戯れたり、絶景を味わったりできて素晴らしかったです。
HSLフェリーを使うと船着場から要塞まで意外と歩くことになります。キングスゲート発着の別の水上バスなら要塞までショートカットできます。
飲食店が豊富にあるので、島に1泊してゆったりと過ごすのもよさそうです。

Thank you for your review!

It's true that in summer time from May to September you can come to Suomenlinna by waterbus as well. The waterbus departs from Helsinki Market Square and stops first at Lonna Island and then at Suomenlinna in Artillery Bay and King’s Gate. 

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
土曜日の午後、ヘルシンキからフェリーで行ってきました。大人気で、フェリーも人で溢れんばかり。ただ、実際に観光してみての感想は、人を惹きつけるこれってものがなく、残念ながら期待値以下でした。
フェリーのるのは、確か片道約４€ほどかかりますし、ちけっとを券売機で買うのに列もできるので、できればHSLのday ticketを事前購入しといたほうが良さそうです。

Thank you for giving us a review.

Hope you get a chance to visit Suomenlinna again. We recommend that you start then from Suomenlinna Visitor Centre right by the main ferry pier. Our staff there will be happy to give you the best tips of the day for an enjoyable visit.

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
とても静かな島です。お昼くらいは来訪客がすごく増えるので、朝イチをおすすめします。船は20分に一回、それぞれ島とヘルシンキから出ていて、乗船時間は20分ほどです。

2時間くらいで大体回れます。

虫と鳥がとにかくすごいですが、それ以外は満足です。景色もとても綺麗です。
owner_answer: Thank you for the review and for the beautiful pictures! We look forward to welcoming you back to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
座落在離赫爾辛基約20分鐘船程的小島上，是已經廢棄的城堡群。基本上剩下一些殘垣斷壁，有一部分的地方可以進去，但很暗
建築群旁邊的海岸宜人，可以到岩石上吹吹風、近距離看海鷗，或是下海游泳
owner_answer: Thank you for the review and for the beautiful pictures! We are happy to hear your trip to Suomenlinna was enjoyable! Warmly welcome again!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Man kann in nur 15 Minuten der Stadt entfliehen und in die Geschichte eintauchen... Selbst wenn man eine Fähre verpasst, liegt die nächste ein paar Minuten später schon vor Anker. Ideal
Die Inselgruppe ist gut zu Fuß zu erkunden
. Es gibt auch Einkehrmöglichkeiten oder einen Supermarkt um den Proviant wieder aufzufüllen.
Planen Sie Zeit ein: es lohnt sich!
Die Fährentickets kann man auch kurz vor Reiseantritt am Kai per Automat kaufen.

Danke für diese wunderschöne Bewertung! Suomenlinna ist sicher besuchenswert und wie gesagt, es lohnt sich bisschen mehr Zeit einzuplanen. Es gibt viel zum Besichtigen auf der Insel - Museen, historische Sehenswürdigkeiten und eine Vielfalt von Cafes und Restaurants. Man kann locker den ganzen Tag in Suomenlinna verbringen. Der Hauptspazierweg auf der Insel ist die Blauen Route, sie ist etwa 1,5 kilometer lang und bietet die besten Seite der Suomenlinna für Besucher an. Die Fahrt mit der Fähre von HSL dauert etwa 15 min und macht Suomenlinna locker erreichbar jeden Tag. 

Herzlich Willkommen nochmals in Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Είναι πολύ κοντά με το πλοίο από την πόλη. Έχει δρομολόγια κάθε 20 λεπτά. Εισιτήριο για το πλοίο μπορείτε να αγοράσετε στο λιμάνι. Υπάρχουν μηχανήματα. Γύρω στα 3€ για να πας. Πίσω πάλι μπορείτε να αγοράσετε από εκεί. Όμορφο νησί. Παλιό φρούριο. Έχει αρκετά πράγματα να δείτε και το περπατήσετε. Υπάρχουν εστιατόρια και καφέ. Αξίζει σίγουρα να το επισκεφτείτε.

Ελπίζουμε να σας ξαναδούμε στο Σουομενλίννα!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
ヘルシンキからフェリーで15分で着く世界遺産の島
大体2時間あれば島全体を回ることができます。
土曜日の9時頃到着しましたが博物館等は10時以降の営業なのでそれが目当ての方はずらしていくことをおすすめします。
島内にはスーパーマーケットもあるのでパンやベリーを買うことをできるのでピクニックの食べ物におすすめです。
かもめが食べ物を狙ってくるので注意してください。

Warmly welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Património Material da Humanidade pela UNESCO, a Fortaleza de Suomelinna é um exemplar impressionante de arquitetura militar. Construído no século 18 para defesa da capital finlandesa, é agora um dos locais turísticos mais famosos do país, e casa de cerca de 800 pessoas. Visita obrigatório!
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and beautiful photos!

We are happy to hear you enjoyed the fortress. If you would like to know more about the history of the fortress, we recommend to visit Suomenlinna Museum or join the guided tour in Suomenlinna. 

Welcome again!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: 「スオメンリンナの要塞」の南東部クスターンミエッカに入ると砲台がたくさん並ぶ丘に出ました。ヘルシンキ港の入口を守るスオメンリンナ要塞の最も防御が堅固な部分の一つで、このエリアには大砲や防御壁が設置されていました。カジマットという要塞内部に設けられた通路や部屋もありました。カジマットは地下に設けられていることが多く、厚い石造りの壁によって保護され弾薬や食料などの物資を安全に保管するための倉庫や敵の攻撃から身を守るための避難所としての役割を果たしていたそうです。複雑な迷路のような構造で、敵が侵入した際に内部を容易に把握できないようになっていて、要塞の防衛において戦略的な役割を見ることができて面白かったです。
owner_answer: Thank you for your detailed review and the wonderful pictures! We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed exploring the underground tunnels and discovering their significance in the fortress’s defense, along with the intricate structure and strategic design of the site. For a more comprehensive understanding of Suomenlinna’s history, we recommend starting your visit at the Suomenlinna Museum. We hope to welcome you back to Suomenlinna soon!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: En kort färje tur från centrum helsinki ligger Sveaborg. Som Unescos världsarvsobjekt är Sveaborg ett exempel på sin tids europeiska militärarkitektur. Fästningen är en oregelbunden bastionfästning som har sin egen speciella karaktär på grund av att den har spelat en roll i försvaret av tre länder Sverige, Ryssland och Finland- vid olika tidpunkter.
owner_answer: Tack för din recension! Vi är glada att du uppskattade ditt besök på Sveaborg och dess rika historia som ett världsarvsobjekt. Vi hoppas att du snart får möjlighet att återvända och utforska ännu mer av fästningens unika arkitektur och historia. Välkommen tillbaka!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Suomenlinna è una fortezza marina edificata su un arcipelago di 6 isole al largo di Helsinki, collegate da ponti pedonali.
Dal 1991, è stata dichiarata dall'UNESCO patrimonio dell'umanità.
Facilmente raggiungibile con il ferry boat che parte ogni 20 minuti ca. dal molo del Kauppatori (è possibile utilizzare il biglietto dei trasporti pubblici HSL oppure si può acquistare il biglietto direttamente al molo).
Il tragitto dura circa 15 minuti e, una volta arrivati sull'isola, conviene consultare la mappa all'ingresso per orientarsi nella visita. Sull'isola ci stanno anche un minimarket, una birreria artigianale ed alcuni caffè/ristoranti.
owner_answer: Thank you for your review and the beautiful pictures! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit to Suomenlinna. For the best tips and recommendations, be sure to start your visit at the Suomenlinna Visitor Centre, located in the pink Jetty Barracks right by the main quay. We look forward to welcoming you back to Suomenlinna soon!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
La isla de Suomenlinna, situada frente a la costa de Helsinki, es un destino imprescindible para quienes buscan historia y belleza natural en un solo lugar. Esta fortaleza marítima del siglo XVIII, Patrimonio de la Humanidad por la UNESCO, ofrece a los visitantes una experiencia única, donde las imponentes murallas y cañones históricos se mezclan armoniosamente con el entorno sereno del archipiélago.

Las vistas desde Suomenlinna son espectaculares, con el horizonte urbano de Helsinki al norte y la inmensidad del Mar Báltico al sur. Caminando por sus senderos, se pueden apreciar verdes praderas, bosques tranquilos y pintorescas casas de madera, todo rodeado por el azul del mar. Los miradores ofrecen panorámicas perfectas para capturar la esencia de esta isla histórica. Suomenlinna es un lugar donde el pasado y la naturaleza se encuentran, proporcionando un entorno ideal para la exploración y la contemplación.
owner_answer:
Muchas gracias por la buena reseña!

Escribes muy bien sobre Suomenlinna y estamos de acuerdo contigo sobre la belleza y unicidad del lugar. Es un lugar muy especial donde hay mucho que explorar. 

Bienvenido de nuevo a Suomenlinna!

review_text: Isola assolutamente da visitare se ci si trova ad Helsinki, un vero museo a cielo aperto, c'è anche un piccolo supermercato

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
bellissima isola con una grande storia, raggiungibile in traghetto, biglietto incluso nell’abbonamento giornaliero della capitale (4 euro circa al giorno e puoi entrare in qualsiasi tram, metro e bus… fantastico) altrimenti per corsa singola sono 2 euro e mezzo. L’isola è stupenda con delle zone super attrezzate tipo bar e ristoranti, moltissimi WC gratuiti e un sacco di cartelli, è impossibile perdersi. Inoltre ogni posto caratteristico viene spiegato dettagliatamente con l’uso dei cartelloni, in inglese in finlandese e in svedese. Sono presenti molti cannoni nel isola come ricordo della guerra con la russia e posti dove fare il bagno con annessa doccia per risciacquarsi. Inoltre c’è anche un ufficio turistico che fornisce diverse informazioni gratuitamente e un museo (costa 6 euro)

abbiamo passato una giornata veramente bella e rilassante
owner_answer:
Thank you very much for visiting and reviewing! 

Suomenlinna is indeed an easy to reach destination with plenty of history to explore, interesting museums and several lovely cafés and restaurants. We are glad to hear that you were happy with the information that was provided! At Suomenlinna Visitor Centre, one can indeed get the best tips for the fortress visit. 

The HSL ferry takes you to Suomenlinna all year round. At the moment, the HSL day ticket costs 9 euros. One can also buy single tickets for approximately 3 euros. 

We hope to see you again soon in Suomenlinna!

Like you said, they can be bought easily from the machines - and also the HSL app! It is a great idea to grab a map at the Visitor Centre in Suomenlinna, as it gives you a great guide to explore the Fortress with its museums, cafes and sights. 

Thank you again and welcome back!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
スオーメンリンナの要塞は、かつてバルト海沿岸の地域大国であったスウェーデンが、対立するロシアから当時スウェーデン領であったフィンランドのヘルシンキを防衛するためにヘルシンキ湾口の島を要塞化したものらしい。18世紀半ば頃より建設が始まり、17世紀頃の火砲の技術水準を反映して完成した星形要塞の形をとって作られたようだ。
この要塞は1808年のフィンランド戦争の折にロシア軍の攻撃を受けスウェーデン軍の守備隊による籠城戦が行われたが、面白いことに兵員にも武器弾薬, 食糧にも余裕を残したままロシア軍に降伏したそうだ。その辺の経緯についても島内の展示で説明されており、楽しく観て回れた。
島内には近世的な建物、星形要塞の堡塁、20世紀初頭頃のものと思しき榴弾砲陣地などがあり、第二次世界大戦中の潜水艦もある。それほど大きな島ではないが展示物は豊富で面白いので、是非訪れることをお薦めしたい。
owner_answer:
Thank you for your detailed and thoughtful review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed exploring Suomenlinna and found its historical significance intriguing. We are glad you appreciated the variety of historical buildings and the diverse collection of artifacts on the island. 
We hope to welcome you back soon!

Cette île est incontournable. Très facile d’accès en bateau que vous prenez avec l’offre de transport public d’Helsinki.

Bienvenue de nouveau à Suomenlinna !

review_text: Świetne miejsce do zwiedzania i długich spacerów. Myślę że warto przeznaczyć na to miejsce minimum 3-4h (ważne przy zakupie biletu) Piękne widoki do foto. Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:

Die Insel ist einfach zu Fuß zu erkunden, der Boden ist durch das alte Pflaster etwas anstrengend zu begehen, aber es lohnt sich! Es gibt zwei, interessante kleine Militär-Museen, welche man zusammen mit dem U-Boot für insgesamt 7,- € besuchen kann, das ist fair bepreist. Die Cafés vor Ort sindnicht günstig, aber wenn man von der Fähre steigt, gibt es techterhand einen kleinen Supermarkt, wo man sich günstiger erfrischen kann.
Es macht Spaß, die alte Festungsanlage zu erkunden und hier und da am Ufer zu entspannen.

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Helsinki’ye gelindiğinde bence gidilmesi gereken en keyifli yerlerden biri.

Suomennlinna adaları 4 parçadan oluşuyor ve birbirlerine köprü ile bağlı olduklarından yürüyerek gezilebiliyor. İsveçliler 18. Yüzyıl sonunda başkenti Rus işgalinden korumak için (Fransız mali desteği ile) kale inşaa etmişler ve başlangıçta adanın adı Sveaborg ile anılırmış ama daha sonra Finlandiya bağımsızlığını ilan edince adı değiştirilmiş ve Helsinki’nin bir bölgesi olmuş. Zamanında askeri üs ve hapishane olarak kullanılan ada Unesco Miras listesinde ve Dünyanın en büyük askeri kalelerinden biri.

Adayı gezmek ücretsiz ancak 20 dakikalık (2.90 € ve 80 dakika boyunca geçerli ) feribotlarla yolculuk yapmanız gerekli.

İçeride market ve birçok kafe var. Müzeleri ise ücret ödeyerek gezebilirsiniz.

Adalar için mavi bir rota hazırlanmış. Eğer onu takip ederek gezerseniz bir çok yeri görmüş oluyorsunuz. Onun haricinde adada çok fazla keşfedilecek yerler var. Biz mavi rotayı yaklaşık 2 buçuk saatte hızlıca gezdik ama çok daha fazla vakit ayırabilirsiniz.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your informative review!

If you want to know more about the history of the fortress, we recommend to visit Suomenlinna Museum or join a guided tour in Suomenlinna. There are also five other museums in Suomenlinna with interesting topics about Finland. If you wish to have more tips for your visit, we recommend to stop by at Suomenlinna Visitor Centre, next to the main pier.

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Es una isla con mucho encanto para visitar en la ciudad de Helsinki.

Se llega a la isla a través de un ferry que se coge en el puerto del mercado de Helsinki. Cada viaje cuesta 2,95 y es válido durante 80 minutos desde la compra del ticket.

Se puede ver la isla recorriendola entera aproximadamente en 2-3 horas.

Recomiendo entrar al punto de información que hay justo al bajar del ferry y coger un folleto en el que se cuenta la historia de la isla, la cual ha pertenecido a 3 países diferentes (Rusia, Suecia y actualmente Finlandia).

El ferry sale del puerto cada 20 minutos y el trayecto dura 10 minutos.

Cuenta también con distintas cafeterías y algún restaurante. Además hay baños públicos gratuitos.
owner_answer:
Muchas gracias por tu reseña!

Nos encanta escuchar que hayas disfrutado de la fortaleza y sus servicios. Es verdad que en el centro de visitantes que está ubicado frente al muelle del ferry, tenemos mapas de Suomenlinna en español y podemos darte los mejores consejos para visitar Suomenlinna. Recomendamos tomar la ruta azul que pasa por las atracciónes principales de la fortaleza. La ruta azul está marcado con las señales azules y tiene 1,5 km de longitud.

Bienvenida de nuevo a Suomenlinna!

review_text: Nádherné pohodové místo, atraktivní z hlediska historie i současnosti. Určitě Suomenlinnu při návštěvě Helsinek nevynechejte, jednoduše dostupná trajektem z přístavu. Informační centrum je na ostrově, možnosti občerstvení či obědu ale byly na začátku května omezené na jednu restauraci - další zatím neotevřené nebo v dlouhodobé rekonstrukci.
owner_answer: Děkujeme za vaši recenzi i navštevu v Suomenlinna! Jak rečeno, Suomenlinna je historičke a zajimavé místo s mnoha různymi restauracemi. Restaurace jsou otevřeny po cely rok, take v květnu. Více informací o restauracích na internetové stránce Suomenlinny. Ještše děkujeme a vítej zpět!

owner_answer: Thank you for the review! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your visit! Make sure to start your visit from Suomenlinna Visitor Centre, located at the pink Jetty Barracks right by the main quay. Come get the best tips for you day! Warmly welcome back to Suomenlinna!

review_text: Bei schönem Wetter ein toller Kurztrip von Helsinki aus. Genügend Zeit einplanen, es gibt nicht nur viel zu sehen, sondern auch wunderschöne Spazierwege.

Suomenlinna hat viele Museen, Restaurants und Cafes, wo man auch bequem Zeit verbringen kann. Der beste Weg zum Spazieren ist die Blauen Route, wo lang man umweltverträglich Suomenlinna entdecken kann. Danke und Herzlich Willkommen zurück in Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Eine von den knapp 300 Inseln vor Helsinki. Besonderheit: Das historische Trockendock ist heute noch in Betrieb. Im Süden kleine ruhige Badebucht
owner_answer: Danke für Ihre Bewertung! Es gibt schon viel was man in Suomenlinna besichtigen kann, wie genau diese Sehenswürdigkeiten die Sie hier beschrieben haben! Die kleine Badebucht ist besonders bequem wenn es draussen heiss ist. Ausserdem gibt es hier auch eine Vielfalt von Cafes und Restaurants, wo man Kleinigkeiten essen kann. Geheimtipp! In Suomenlinna empfehlen wir immer der Blauen Route zu folgen, um die Festung umweltveträglich zu entdecken. Herzlich Willkommen nochmals!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Interessante Insel vor der Stadt. Festes Schuhwerk ist dringend empfohlen. Kinderwagen mitzuführen, ist schon schwierig - Rollator oder Rollstuhl kann man vergessen.
Man kann lange flanieren und an mehreren stellen bei Café, Kuchen oder Pizza pausieren.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your visit.

We agree that comfortable walking shoes are a must for a smooth visit to Suomenlinna fortress. With little children in a stroller or pram it is little challenging to explore the fortress but doable. For people with limited mobility or on a wheelchair, we recommend visiting together with an assistant.

Welcome again to Suomenlinna! Stop by Suomenlinna Visitor Centre next to the main ferry pier to get the best tips for the day from our staff.

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Peculiar fortaleza o castillo en unas islas muy cerquita de Helsinki, merece la pena conocerlo, podrás coger el barco en el puerto de Helsinki y te llevará a esta isla en unos veinte minutos
owner_answer: Thank you for the review and for the nice pictures! Warmly welcome back to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Ein wunderschönes Ausflugsziel direkt vor Helsinki. Man fährt mit der Fähre von dem kleinen Hafen der an der Markthalle liegt in ca 15min zu den Festungsinseln. Dort am Anlegeplatz gibt es auch einen kleinen Supermarkt falls man sich noch mit Getränken etc versorgen möchte. Es gibt aber auch einige kleine Cafés und Restaurants auf den Inseln. Es ist alles sehr gut ausgeschildert und wenn man der blauen Route folgt, kommt man u.a. auch an einem Museum vorbei, das einen über die Geschichte der Festungsinseln informiert. Allerdings kostet das Museum 9 Euro Eintritt. Ansonsten kann  man einfach nur die schöne Natur und Landschaft genießen. Es gibt auch ein paar Stellen an denen man baden kann.
Wenn man z.B. in Helsinki das Tagesticket hat, ist die Fahrt mit der Fähre zu der Insel schon mit drin.

Eine Fahrt mit der HSL Fähre dauert ungefähr 15 min und sie fährt den ganzen Tag, jeden Tag! Und genau, wir empfehlen immer der Blauen Route zu folgen, weil sie die besten Seiten von Suomenlinna umweltverträglich anbietet. Geniessen Sie die Natur und Landschaft von Suomenlinna umwelträglich auch in der Zukunft! Danke für ihren Besuch und Herzlich Willkommen nochmals in Suomenlinna!

review_text: Hodně zajímavé místo, kde se dá strávit spousta hodin.  Příjemná místa - občerstvení, káva, kostel, výhledy na moře... Historie.

owner_answer: Thank you for visiting Suomenlinna and taking the time to give us a review! We look forward to welcoming you back!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Mooi eiland, bijzonder vanwege het fort en de natuur. Wij hebben hier een aantal dagen overnacht en verschillende bezienswaardigheden bezocht. Vanuit Suomenlina hebben we ook Helsinki kunnen bezoeken.
owner_answer: Thank you for giving us a review! We are happy to hear your visit to Suomenlinna was enjoyable. Warmly welcome back again!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Un site historique très sympa, avec des circuits proposés par les guides de la ville, un musée présentant des expositions d'art, situé à proximité de Helsinki, c'est une belle destination incluse dans le billet de transport de Helsinki toutes zones.

Je vous conseille de vous y rendre tôt et de prévoir au moins une demi-journée pour découvrir l'île, mais soyez prudent en hiver car le sol peut être glissant.
owner_answer:
Merci pour votre avis et votre visite ! En plus de vos excellents conseils, nous recommandons de visiter le Musée Suomenlinna pour découvrir l'histoire de la forteresse.

En hiver, il est en effet important d'être prudent car les routes et les chemins peuvent être glissants. Il existe aussi des itinéraires qui ne sont pas entretenus en hiver, il est donc important de respecter la signalisation. L'itinéraire bleue est notre itinéraire recommandée toute l’année. En suivant l'itinéraire bleue, on peut facilement découvrir la forteresse et ses points d'intêrets. De plus, en suivant l'itinéraire bleue on évite la plupart des zones résidentielles et les visiteurs peuvent ainsi respecter la  vie des 800 habitants de Suomenlinna.

Notre personnel au Centre des visiteurs de Suomenlinna, situé juste à côté du quai priniciapl, est à la dispositions des visiteurs pour les meilleurs conseils et recommendations pour la visite.

Bienvenue de nouveau à Suomenlinna !

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Kdo navštíví Helsinky a nezajede se podívat na Suomenlinnu, jako by v Helsinkách nebyl! Čtvrtá návštěva a znovu nadšení.
owner_answer:
Thank you for the review!

It's amazing to hear that you visit Suomenlinna time and time again! It is truly a unique destination with a special atmosphere. Different seasons provide a different experience, and there are also plenty of interesting events held at the fortress! 

See you again soon in Suomenlinna! We are happy to give you the best tips of the day at Suomenlinna Visitor Centre.

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Local muito bonito. O mais lindo de todos em Helsinki. O acesso é muito fácil com um ferry de 15 minutos a partir do centro de Helsinki. Sugiro levar seu lanche para poder caminhar por todas as ilhas.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and beautiful photos!

We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit in Suomenlinna. If you wish to have a break when exploring the fortress, we recommend to stop by at the restaurants and cafés. Also, there are six different museums to explore in Suomenlinna. 

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Nieprawdopodobnie klimatyczne miejsce.Spacer zimą po zmrożonej wyspie pomiędzy zabytkowymi budowlami który zajmuje szlakiem niebieskim około 2 h robi wrażenie.Tym bardziej jak jest wietrznie,zimno i pusto :-D
owner_answer:
Thank you for your kind review and for sharing your pictures from the fortress!

We are very glad to hear you enjoyed Suomenlinna's wintry atmosphere and the historical architecture. Indeed, the best way to see the main sights and explore the islands is to follow the 1,5 km long blue route. The blue route is maintained also in winter, but it is still important to be careful and watch your step. You can find the blue route from our online guide at guide.suomenlinna.fi.

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Consiglio a tutti di fare una gita su questa isola molto suggestiva! Innanzitutto è piacevole prendere il traghetto che dal porto di Helsinki porta sull' isola. I biglietti sono acquistabili stesso all' ingresso. Il tragitto dura solo 15 minuti, e vi da tempo per fare qualche scatto in mezzo al mare o a qualche isolotto di passaggio. Scesi sull' isola c' è un percorso da seguire, non molto chiaro, ma vi consiglio di prendere una mappa che trovate al centro informazioni appena scesi. Siate consapevoli che bisogna camminare, e molto! Indossate scarpe comode perché la pavimentazione non è d'aiuto e penso sia scomoda da usare in passeggino o sedia a rotelle. Credo che abbiamo girato tutta l' isola, impiegandoci circa un paio d' ore, ad un certo punto però siamo tornati indietro poiché eravamo esausti. Sull' isola ci sono dei bar all' inizio del percorso,poi non mi pare di averne trovati altri... vi consiglio di camminare fino alle porte del re per godere di un bellissimo panorama a strapiombo sul mare! C' è anche un piccolo museo da poter visitare. Una bella passeggiata tra la storia, immersi nella natura!
owner_answer:
Thank you for your lovely review and for sharing your beautiful photos from the fortress!

It's lovely to hear that you enjoyed your visit to Suomenlinna. The fortress is truly a lovely place for immersing yourself in the history and nature of the islands.

Like you said, it's good to start the visit to Suomenlinna from Suomenlinna Visitor Centre, located next to the ferry pier. At the Visitor Centre we are happy to give you the best tips on routes, sights, services and more! One can also grab a map and see an introductory exhibition. 

The Blue Route is indeed the best way to see the key sights of Suomenlinna. It's smart to bring good walking shoes, since the terrain is uneven at times. One can read more about the accessibility in Suomenlinna from our website. 

There are several cafés, restaurants, and museums all around the fortress, some of which are open all year round. You can find your way to all the services and sights with the help of our online guide: guide.suomenlinna.fi.

Welcome again soon to the fortress!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Frumoasa și liniștită, misterioasa și totuși plina de viață. Noi am petrecut o zi întreaga acolo și cu vizitarea muzeelor care nu sunt mari dar foarte interesante.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review!

Glad to hear you have enjoyed your visit in Suomenlinna. Suomenlinna indeed has many interesting sides as it's a historical fortress but also a neighborhood of Helsinki with 800 local residents. To respect the privacy of the residents, we have planned the Blue route for visitors to follow. The Blue route goes through the fortress via all the main sights of Suomenlinna.

Welcome again!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Petite île sympathique, on peut s’y rendre depuis un petit bateau ou un ferry, nous avons pris la compagnie FRS pour 8,50€ aller retour par personne.
Sur place vous avez des restaurants, des cafés, une boutique souvenirs ainsi que des musées.
Il y a de beaux paysages, prévoir 1 heures pour visiter l’île sans visiter les musées.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review! 

We recommend to follow the Blue route which goes through the main sights of Suomenlinna. The Blue route is marked with the blue signs on the streets and it is 1.5 kilometers long. The Blue route is the best way to explore the fortress safely and respect the residents of Suomenlinna. 

Welcome again!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Muy agradable el paseo señalizado que tienen y que comunica algunas islas. Se llega con el transporte público como si fuese un bus más.
owner_answer:
Muchas gracias por tu reseña!

Nos encanta escuchar que hayas disfrutado de la fortaleza y del paseo aquí. La ruta Azul está maracado con las señales azules y es la mejor manera de explorar la fortaleza y las atracciones principales. 

Bienvenido de nuevo!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Ένα νησάκι με Κάστρο 🏰, απέχει μόλις 10- 15' λεπτά, έχει καφετέριες, εστιατόρια, μουσείο και βιβλιοθήκη!
owner_answer:
Ευχαριστούμε πολύ για την αξιολόγησή σας και τις όμορφες φωτογραφίες σας από το φρούριο Σουομενλίννα.

Σουομενλίννα είναι ένα θαλασσινό φρούριο του οποίου η ιστορία χρονολογείται από το 1748. Κάστρο δεν θα βρείτε εδώ. :) Μπορείτε όμως να παρατηρήσετε την δομή και τα χαρακτηριστικά του ιστορικού φρουρίου, παρακολουθώντας την Μπλέ διαδρομή. 
Βρείτε αυτή την διαδρομή σημειωμένη με μπλέ γραμμή σε όλους τους χάρτες μας.

Ελπίζουμε να σας ξαναδούμε στο Σουομενλίννα!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Isola molto carina, raggiungibile tramite traghetto da Helsinki. Paesaggio e vista sul mare bellissimi, rifugi e laghetti ghiacciati molto suggestivi. C'è tanto da camminare ma ne vale davvero la pena.
owner_answer: Thank you for your review! The views truly are beautiful in Suomenlinna. The recommended Blue route, which covers all the main sights and most services, is about 1,5 km long and takes around 30-40 minutes to walk one way. We hope to see you soon again in Suomenlinna! Our staff at the Visitor Centre next to the ferry pier, is happy to provide tips and recommendations for the visit.

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Suomenlinnassa on helppo kulkea ja maisema on kaunis. Kesä päivällä kannattaa varautua ja laittaa aurinko rasvaa. Suomenlinnassa kuhisee turisteja kesällä ja lautalle menossa jono voi olla pitkä. Suosittelen ottamaan eväät ja menemään kallioille vaikka piknikille.
Hyvää matkaa ja pidä hauskaa jos menet.
😁
owner_answer:
Hei, ja kiitos arvostelustasi! Mukava kuulla, että Suomenlinnan maisemat ovat mieluisat. Kesäisin hyvä sää houkuttelee maailmanperintökohteeseen paljon vierailijoita, joten iltapäivisin lauttarantaan saattaa kertyä jonoa. HSL:n lautan lisäksi saaresta pääsee Kauppatorille myös vesibussi FRS Finlandin kyydissä. FRS:n kaksi laituria löytyvät Tykistölahdelta Suomenlinnan museon edestä, sekä Kustaanmiekalta Kuninkaanportin edestä. Liput voi ostaa itse vesibussilta. Saaressa on eväiden syömiseen oma evästila ja tarvittaessa myös K-market, sekä monia hyviä kahviloita ja ravintoloita nälän yllättäessä! Suosittelemme myös seuraamaan Sinistä reittiä, sillä se kunnioittaa Suomenlinnan ainutlaatuista ympäristöä. Suosittelemme myös lämpimästi pitämään hauskaa Suomenlinnassa!

Tervetuloa uudelleen!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Paikalla käynyt ennenkin mutta nyt opastetulla kierroksella ja tästä historiallisesta paikasta saa paljon enemmän irti oppaan seurassa
owner_answer:
Kiitos arvostelusta.

Mukava kuulla että sait opastetusta kierroksesta paljon irti. Opastetulle kierrokselle osallistuminen tai Suomenlinna-museossa vierailu on hyvä tapa sukeltaa syvemmälle merilinnoituksen mielenkiintoiseen historiaan.

Tervetuloa pian uudelleen Suomenlinnaan!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Aivan ihana retkikohde. Joko piknik eväiden kanssa tai käydä ravintolassa tai kahvilassa nauttimassa.
owner_answer:
Kiitos arvostelusta ja kauniista kuvista!

Mukava kuulla, että olet viihtynyt Suomenlinnassa. Suomenlinnan ihanien kahviloiden ja ravintoloiden lisäksi suosittelemme tutustumaan Suomenlinnan mielenkiintoisiin museoihin, joita on yhteensä kuusi kappaletta. 

Tervetuloa uudelleen Suomenlinnaan!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Fantastyczne miejsce dla miłośników historii, militariów i przyrody - Twierdza Szwedzka położona na wyspach piękne miejsce
owner_answer: Thank you for these lovely pictures! We are happy to welcome you back to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: 大砲や防空壕？などが数多く残されており、戦争の記憶と、とても北欧らしい景色のミスマッチが素敵な所でした。
owner_answer: Thank you for your review and beautiful pictures. Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Đi tàu từ cầu cảng Helsinki ra đảo khoảng 20ph đến thăm đảo và pháo đài, khá giống Hỏa lò ở Hà nọi nhưng khác là nơi phòng thủ từ thế kỷ 18 !
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review!

Suomenlinna Sea Fortress is a UNESCO World Heritage Site as it is a unique monument of military architecture. Another special feature of the fortress is that it has served in the defence of three realms: Sweden, Russia and Finland. Moreover, it continues to be an inhabited district of the city of Helsinki. 

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: 世界遺産登録されている要塞遺構ですが、これは稜堡式城郭の完成形と思います。城郭に興味のある方であれば、丸一日散策して過ごせます。
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and nice photos.

We recommend following the Blue route to get to know the fortress. You can find this route marked with a blue line in all our maps.

To learn more about the rich history of this UNESCO World Heritage Site, you can visit the Suomenlinna Museum or join a guided walking tour.

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: ヘルシンキからフェリーで15分で気軽に行ける島。ゆっくり散歩するのにちょうど良い。
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review, glad you enjoyed the peaceful ambiance in Suomenlinna!

One can indeed get to Suomenlinna easily on a public transport ferry, which also gives you a great opportunity to admire views of Helsinki from the sea. The best way to see all the historical sights and explore the sea fortress, is to follow the blue route. You can find the blue route and information about the ferry from our online guide at guide.suomenlinna.fi.

Hope to see you again soon in Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: 芬蘭堡適合停留一天細細品味的好地方！
owner_answer: Thank you for your review and visit to Suomenlinna! Welcome again!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Tolle Insel!
Mit der Fähre einfach übersetzen und zu Fuß erkunden. Es gibt Cafés und Ausstellungen.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and for visiting Suomenlinna!

The sea fortress actually consists of eight different islands, though the important historical sights are located on the three main islands. The best way to see all these sights is to follow the blue route. Like you mention, there are several cafes, restaurants and museums on the islands. There is also an art gallery that is open all year round, and often some temporary art exhibitions as well. You can find more information from our online guide at guide.suomenlinna.fi.

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Fortaleza de grande dimensão em bom estado de conservação. Acesso por barco  (viagem de 15 min).  Duração da visita aproximadamente 2 horas.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and for visiting Suomenlinna!

Suomenlinna is a historical sea fortress with impressive military architecture. The construction of the fortress began in 1748. To see all the important sights, we recommend you follow the 1,5 km long blue route. Furthermore, there are several museums, cafes and restaurants on the islands, so one can easily spend even the whole day in Suomenlinna.

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Крепость построена в 1748 году. В 1991 году включена в список объектов всемирного наследия ЮНЕСКО. Можно бесплатно доплыть паромом с торговой площади, потому что билеты никто не проверяет. В информационном центре есть туалет и бесплатные карты острова на разных языках. На осмотр крепости уходит 3 часа.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and visit to Suomenlinna! It's easy to travel to Suomenlinna as the ferry is part of public transport and is also included in day tickets for the public transport system. There are regular ticket inspections on the ferry and passengers travelling without a valid ticket can receive a fine of 100€. 

In addition to the maps and toilet facilities, visitors can receive tips and recommendations for their visit and get to know a free introductory exhibition at the Visitor Centre.

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Tolle Insel und viel zu entdecken. Mit einer Fähre zu erreichen. Für einen Tagesausflug perfekt.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your visit.

To get to know and explore the fortress, we recommend following the Blue route which focuses on the three main islands of Suomenlinna. You can find this route in all our maps marked with a blue line, or in our online guide guide.suomenlinna.fi

It is easy to get to Suomenlinna all year round with the ferry from Helsinki Market Square. In summer, you can also catch a waterbus. Note that the waterbus service is operated by a private company and local public transport (HSL/HRT)tickets are not valid. For the waterbus you can buy tickets on board from staff or in advance on line.

Hope to see you again in Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Wspaniałe miejsce! Piękna przyroda, historia i świetne jedzenie. Niezapomniane widoki.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and beautiful pictures!

Glad to hear you enjoyed visiting Suomenlinna. It's true that Suomenlinna is a great combination of fascinating history and beautiful nature. Besides that, there are lovely restaurants and cafes and interesting museums in Suomenlinna. 

Warmly welcome again!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: È una fortezza su un arcipelago Vale la pena vederla si raggiunge con la barca(costo biglietto come i trasporti pubblici € 3,10) e non si paga niente ci sono bar ristoranti un museo di divise, macchine e cannoni appartenuti alla guerra .... Molto bello
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and visit to UNESCO World Heritage Site Suomenlinna! As you mention, visitors have to pay only for the transport and services on site. Being a neighborhood of Helsinki, Suomenlinna sea fortress can otherwise be visited free of charge. There are also several museums, cafes etc. to enjoy. From Suomenlinna Visitor Centre, located right next to the ferry pier, visitors can get tips and recommendations for their visit.

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Belle promenade autour de l’île. Dégustation de petits gâteaux ! Très beaux paysages. Magnifique journée!
owner_answer: Thank you for this review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit to Suomenlinna! Warmly welcome back again!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Mit der Fähre von Helsinki erreicht man die Insel sehr bequem. Dort angekommen, gibt es hier sehr viel zu sehen, sogar ein kleines U-Boot kann besichtigt werden (was angeblich wegen eines Berechnungsfehlers nur maximal einen Torpedo laden konnte :-)) Unbedingt Decke und etwas fürs Picknick mitbringen. Hier kann mal sich sehr schön erholen.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and visit to Suomenlinna! There are indeed lots of interesting things to see and do in Suomenlinna for the whole family. The fortress is open all year round and the experience is always different depending on the season. 

Suomenlinna Visitor Centre by the ferry pier is the best place to start the visit. Our staff is happy to give tips and recommendations to spend a lovely day exploring the fortress. 

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Isola a venti minuti di battello da Helsinki. Acquistabile con un biglietto dei mezzi A-B a 3,1€. Abbiamo passato tre orette buone a camminare e fare foto al paesaggio che ci presentava. Esperienza consigliata, soprattutto in una giornata di sole.

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Gruppo di isolotti un tempo adibiti a fortezze militari. Oggi la zona è la tipica gita fuori porta degli abitanti di Helsinki. Raggiungibile con un breve tragitto in traghetto. Merita sicuramente una visita in tutte le stagioni.
owner_answer: Thank you for your review and visit to Suomenlinna! As you mention, Suomenlinna is worth visiting all year round. Every season has its own character and offers a different experience of the historical sea fortress and the archipelago nature. Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Chegue cedo e saia tarde, O lugar é histórico e repleto de museus e lugares para andar. Visitamos 3 ilhas,

Suomenlinna é um daqueles lugares que você deve visitar nas 4 diferentes estações do ano: primavera,  verão,  outono e inverno. Alguns cafés e restaurantes ficam abertos apenas no verão,  mas não se preocupe! Há diversas opções de cafés e restaurantes abertos durante todo o ano, incluindo um pequeno mercado para abastacer os residentes locais.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your lovely review and great tips! We also recommend visiting Suomenlinna in all seasons. The experience is always different and offers something new. 

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Als je in Helsinki bent, moet je hier ook even heen. Historische vesting waar je prachtig kunt wandelen. Ben heel benieuwd hoe het daar in de zomer is, maar in de winter is het er prachtig.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and for recommending us!

The best way to see the islands and the main sights of the fortress is to follow the blue route. You can also stop by museums or try some great food or delicacies at one of the cafes and restaurants. 

Hopefully you get to visit Suomenlinna in the summertime as well!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Het is een mooi gerenoveerd en gegentrificeerd eiland waar je met plezier rond kan lopen tussen de woonwijken die zich in de vesting bevinden. Het eiland maakt deel uit van de nationale geschiedenis van Finland door de afgelopen 4 eeuwen heen. Het uitzicht is prachtig. Er zijn door het hele gebied restaurants en bars te vinde. De meeste zijn in de winter gesloten.
Het hele gebied is toegankelijk voor wandelingen mbv looproutes en wandelpaden. Let wel op dat deze in de winter glad kunnen zijn. Het eiland kan ook behoorlijk koud zijn ten opzichte van de stad Helsinki. Zeker een aanrader om bij je stedentrip toe te voegen.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review.

We recommend following the Blue route for getting to know the fortress and its historical sights. This route is maintained also in winter but when visiting during winter months it is still important to watch your step and to wear good winter shoes. You can find the Blue route marked with a blue line in all our maps.

To learn more about the interesting history of the fortress, visit Suomenlinna Museum where you can also watch a short movie, join a guided walking tour or follow a digital walking tour at your own pace through a mobile application. 
Many cafés and restaurants stay open in winter too. Check daily opening hours from the opening hours calendar on our website www.suomenlinna.fi

Warmly welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Un journée d'excursion parfaite entre histoire et nature. Musée militaire interessant
owner_answer: Merci pour votre avis et votre visite ! Suomenlinna offre en effet une multitude d'expériences différentes. En plus du Musée militaire, le musée Suomenlinna mérite également une visite car il présente l'histoire de la forteresse et aide à comprendre ce que l'on voit lors d'une visite de Suomenlinna. Bienvenue de nouveau !

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Helainki merkezden 10 dakikada ulaşabileceğiniz bir ada. Zamanında savunma amaçlı kurulmuş bu ada da surları görebilirsiniz. Daha sonra kültür adası olarak revize edilmiş. Denizde bir çok küçük ada var üzerinde çeşitli binalar olan. Bu ada en büyükleri. Müze, restaurant ve Cafeler mevcut. Mutlaka ziyaret edin. Özelikle merkez cafeye uğrayın.
owner_answer: Thank you for your review and sharing your lovely photos and great tips for others! Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Está fortaleza se encuentra en una isla (varias islas unidas por puentes) y para llegar a ella tenemos que coger un ferry desde Helsinki, al lado de la plaza del mercado. La entrada es gratuita y es un lugar ideal para pasar el día, pasear y conocer la historia de esta fortaleza. En verano abren un montón de cafeterías y restaurantes. A la entrada hay un centro de visitantes donde te dan información y planos con los distintos recorridos. Visita muy recomendada.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and recommendation! Suomenlinna offers indeed a lovely setting to enjoy history, culture and archipelago nature. During summer time, there are lots of different services but for those visiting Suomenlinna in other seasons, there are also museums, cafes and restaurants. As you mention, visitors can receive tips and recommendations for their visit from Suomenlinna Visitor Centre. 

Welcome again to Suomenlinna!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
從赫爾辛基搭船約15分鐘左右，有芬蘭卡就不需額外買船票。
相當值得花時間來看看。
搭船可以看見許多小島，很漂亮。
owner_answer:
Thank you for visiting and for reviewing us!

Suomenlinna sea fortress consists of eight beautiful islands. You can explore the three main islands by following the Blue Route, which takes you to the most important historical sights. 

The HSL ferry takes you from the Market Square to Suomenlinna in about 15 minutes. The ferry is part of the local public transport system, and it operates all year round. During summer season, one can also take a private company waterbus.

Welcome again! Stop by at Suomenlinna Visitor Centre right next to the ferry pier to get some tips for your visit.

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Luogo dove il tempo sembra essersi fermato, una fortezza medievale che si trova su tre isolette di fronte Helsinki collegate da ponticelli pedonali. Facilmente raggiungibile con il ferry che parte ogni 40 minuti, potete utilizzare il biglietto del bus. C'è anche un supermercato, una birreria artigianale ed alcuni caffè/ristoranti. Uno dei must per i turisti in città.
owner_answer:
Thank you for your review and for visiting Suomenlinna!

Suomenlinna is a sea fortress, consisting of eight different islands, whose rich history dates back to 1748, when Finland was part of Sweden. To learn more about the history of Suomenlinna, you can visit the Suomenlinna museum or join a guided tour. There are several museums, cafés and restaurants on the islands.

Свеабо́рг (швед. Sveaborg, Свеаборй — крепость Свеа) или Су́оменлинна (фин. лат. Suomenlinna — крепость Финляндии), — бастионная система укреплений на островах близ столицы Финляндии Хельсинки. Административно — район города Хельсинки. С XVIII до середины XX века укрепления защищали Гельсингфорс с моря, с 1960-х годов — музей и жилой район.В настоящее время крепость Свеаборг является одной из основных достопримечательностей Хельсинки, она с 1991 года внесена в список всемирного наследия ЮНЕСКО. На островах бывшей крепости располагается несколько музеев, военно-морская академия финского флота и тюрьма облегчённого режима, заключенные которой работают на поддержании крепости в порядке. В составе укреплений — многочисленная артиллерия времён развития крепости.
Вход в саму крепость свободный, платить надо только при посещении музеев.
Готовьтесь провести тут целый день. На острове есть магазин, он находится на причале. На самом острове есть кафешки.
Sveaborg (Swedish Sveaborg, Sveabori - Svea fortress) or Suomenlinna (Finnish Lat. Suomenlinna - fortress of Finland), is a bastion system of fortifications on the islands near the capital of Finland, Helsinki. Administratively, it is a district of the city of Helsinki. From the 18th to the middle of the 20th century, the fortifications protected Helsingfors from the sea, since the 1960s - the museum and the residential area. Currently, Sveaborg Fortress is one of the main attractions of Helsinki, since 1991 it has been included in the UNESCO World Heritage List. On the islands of the former fortress there are several museums, the naval academy of the Finnish fleet and a light security prison, the prisoners of which work to maintain the fortress in order. The fortifications include numerous artillery from the time of the development of the fortress.
Entrance to the fortress itself is free, you have to pay only when visiting museums.
Get ready to spend the whole day here. There is a shop on the island, it is located on the pier. There are cafes on the island itself.

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
Soumenlinna, l'imponente fortezza situata su un arcipelago al largo di Helsinki, è un sito che merita assolutamente una visita. Dichiarata Patrimonio dell'Umanità dall'UNESCO, questa fortezza marina è un testimone vivente della storia militare finlandese e svedese.

**Posizione e Accesso**
La fortezza si trova su un gruppo di sei isole, facilmente raggiungibili con un breve tragitto in traghetto dal porto di Helsinki. Il viaggio in sé è già un'esperienza piacevole, con splendide vedute sul mare e sulla città.

**Storia e Architettura**
Costruita nel XVIII secolo dai svedesi per difendersi dalla Russia, Soumenlinna è un labirinto di bastioni, cannoni, e casematte. Le sue mura di pietra massiccia, le intricate gallerie sotterranee e i vasti spazi aperti evocano un senso di potenza e resistenza. È possibile passeggiare liberamente attraverso i numerosi sentieri che si snodano tra le isole, esplorando sia le aree ben conservate che quelle più selvagge e naturali.

**Esperienza Culturale**
Soumenlinna non è solo una fortezza, ma anche un quartiere abitato con una vivace comunità locale. Ci sono musei interessanti, come il Museo di Soumenlinna, che racconta la storia della fortezza, e il Museo Militare, che offre una prospettiva più dettagliata sul ruolo della fortezza nelle varie guerre. Troverete anche gallerie d'arte, caffè, e ristoranti, dove è possibile rilassarsi e assaporare la cucina locale.

**Atmosfera**
Passeggiare per Soumenlinna è come fare un tuffo nel passato, ma con un'atmosfera serena e pittoresca. I panorami mozzafiato sul Mar Baltico, le barche che passano e le isole vicine offrono un'esperienza visiva e sensoriale unica. Le isole sono perfette per un picnic estivo o una passeggiata autunnale, con la possibilità di scoprire angoli tranquilli e appartati.

**Conclusione**
Soumenlinna è un'attrazione imperdibile per chiunque visiti Helsinki. Che siate appassionati di storia, amanti della natura o semplicemente in cerca di un luogo dove rilassarvi lontano dal trambusto cittadino, Soumenlinna offre qualcosa di speciale per tutti. È un luogo dove la storia si intreccia con la bellezza naturale, creando un'esperienza indimenticabile.

Die Fähre zur Festung verkehrt ganzjährig. Alle Jahreszeiten verleihen der Festung einen anderen Charme.

Willkommen in der Festung auch ein anderes Mal!

name: Suomenlinna

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: Zona amb més afluència de gent però tot i així sense aglomeracions. Està tot molt ben indicat i explicat, es poden agafar mapes en varies llengües de forma gratuïta, en espanyol també. Val la pena anar-hi. S'hi arriba en ferry utilitzant el mateix bitllet del transport públic de la ciutat, el que fa que surti molt econòmic.
owner_answer:
Moltes gràcies per la teva ressenya i per les boniques fotos! Suomenlinna és un barri de Hèlsinki on viuen aproximadament 800 persones i a més pertany al Patrimoni Mundial de la Humanitat de la UNESCO. Tot i que rep molts visitants durant tot l'any, és molt acollidor visitar-hi perquè la zona és molt gran: té múltiples illes i molt que fer. Els mapes gratuïts es poden trobar fàcilment a la Informació Turística en sortir del ferri. A part del ferri, també es pot arribar a la fortalesa en un autobús aquàtic durant l'estiu.

Ens agrada que hagis gaudit del viatge a Suomenlinna. Benvingut de nou!

name: Suomenlinna
review_text: １２月の末でしたが、比較的天気の良い日に訪れました。要塞というだけあってさまざまな年代の建築物があり、風景といっしょに楽しめます。島内に「ぬいぐるみの博物館」があり、おもちゃの国に迷い込んだように感じます。派手なものはありませんが、建物の見学に飽きて時間があれば立ち寄ってみるのもいいと思います。ヘルシンキの港から簡単に渡ることができます。かならず帰りの便の時刻を確認しておくことをお勧めします。半日で見て歩くのは少し忙しい見学になると思います。バルト海を見ながら島での時間を楽しみたいですね。

name: Suomenlinna
review_text:
很推薦的地點（軍事堡）！有超級美的風景，搭配陽光、草坪、建築、海。建議天氣好的時候來，才能將美景盡收眼底，還能悠遊的散步。
船票來回五歐元，大約每20分鐘一班船，航程大約十五分鐘，非常方便。
購票一率採自助式，很有歐洲的風格。
下船後有看到一間超市，可以買一些麵包點心，在路上的時候可以坐下來野餐，享受大海。
去之前有人說兩個小時就夠了，但我這趟旅程在這裡待了四個小時。

春天去還有一些沒融化的雪，所有走路的時候要小心。特別注意有些路會結冰塊，走在上面很容易滑倒，要特別小心。
地圖上有些標註有廁所的地方是只有夏天才開放喔！
